nswrail.title: [SYDAC] NSW State Rail Train Driving Simulator
nswrail.subtitle: Lead Software Engineer:
nswrail.line1: Developed the out of the window vision for 3 train driving simulators
nswrail.line2: C and C++ on SGI IRIX using ONYX 2 and Octane 2 Hardware
nswrail.line3: Developed a multi-threaded skeletal animation system and pipeline for SGI Performer

scenario.title: [SYDAC] NSW State Rail Virtual Reality Theater Scenario
scenario.subtitle: Lead Software Engineer:
scenario.line1: Created a number of virtual scenarios for safety training
scenario.line2: C and C++ on SGI IRIX, SGI Performer, Multigen Vega, and BDI Peopleshop
scenario.line3: Developed multi-processor architecture for SGI ONYX 2 Hardware with 12 CPUs

trawler.title: [SYDAC] Maritime Simulator
trawler.subtitle: Senior Software Engineer:
trawler.line1: Trawler Boat driving and operational simulator
trawler.line2: Programming in Java, and C++, and OpenGL
trawler.line3: Worked with RMIT University on porting the 3D graphics to SGI Pereformer

westrail.title: [SYDAC] Westrail Train Driving Simulator
westrail.subtitle: Senior Software Engineer:
westrail.line1: Simulated cabin gauges for locomotive dynamics using Java 2D graphics
westrail.line2: PLC Interface with an physical train cabin

sugar.title: [SYDAC] Mackay Sugar Train Simulator
sugar.subtitle: Lead Software Engineer:
sugar.line1: Out of the window vision for a train driving simulator
sugar.line2: Integrated with a physics model to optimize fuel usage based on locomotive configuration
sugar.line3: Developed with C++ and Multigen Vega Prime

radar.title: [SYDAC] Radar and Electronic Warfare Simulator
radar.subtitle: Lead Software Engineer:
radar.line1: Simulated 7 radar modes for the search and surveillance aircraft
radar.line3: Developed the simulator framework in C++ and Open Scenegraph

ircm.title: [SYDAC] Infrared Counter-measure Simulator
ircm.subtitle: Lead Software Engineer:
ircm.line1: Simulation of a virtual SAM tracking the engine plume of an aircraft
ircm.line2: Allowed development and test of counter-measure image processing algorithms
ircm.line3: C++ and OpenGL synchronized across 4 Pc nodes

vts.title: [SYDAC] Virtual Threat Simulator
vts.subtitle: Lead Software Engineer:
vts.line1: A virtual environment to operate a Mock Surface-To-Air Missile Launcher (SAM)
vts.line2: C++ and SGI OpenGL Performer, Networked across 6 Pc nodes
vts.line3: Interfaced with 6 DOF VR Headset & 6 DOF Sensor on the Mock SAM

topcon.title: [Topcon Positioning Systems] Excavator Monitor
topcon.subtitle: Software Engineer:
topcon.line1: 3D Monitor of operating an excavator using Unity Game Engine
topcon.line2: Communicated via TCP & UDP with GPS sensors mounted on the excavator
topcon.line3: Realtime visualization of all moving parts of the excavator

euclideon.title: [Euclideon] Unlimited Detail
euclideon.subtitle: Senior Programmer:
euclideon.line1: Voxel based renderer for large point cloud datasets
euclideon.line2: Contributed to the data pipeline and supporting tools
